response.overview: Dinko and Marija decided to treat themselves this year and take their kids on a summer vacation. They booked the most beautiful apartments, right by the sea on the most stunning Adriatic island. However, as soon as they arrive, their dream vacation turns into a nightmare. The apartment owner, Vesna, insists they never made a reservation. Dinko must protect his family, but he's at a loss for how to do it. Meanwhile, Marija suspects that foreign tourists, who are increasingly filling the courtyard, are occupying their apartments. With tension rising and time running out, they must uncover the truth before their holiday is ruined and their dream apartments turn into a mirage.
response.title: Mirage
